caseStudies.title: Digital Literacy for 10 Million Rural Women
caseStudies.challenge: Women in rural India faced significant barriers to economic participation due to lack of digital literacy.
caseStudies.solution: Technology-enabled learning platform deployed across 5,000 community centers with culturally adapted curriculum in 12 regional languages.

caseStudies.title: STEM Education for 5 Million Underrepresented Students
caseStudies.challenge: Girls and ethnic minorities significantly underrepresented in computer science and STEM fields.
caseStudies.solution: Comprehensive STEM ecosystem spanning K-12 to career with curriculum in 10,000 schools and 50,000 teachers trained.
